page.title: 08BALLYCLARE HEALTH CENTRE
page.content:
Ballyclare{Health Centre}is situated in George Ave. There are eight doctors altogether although there are only seven of them there each day.If you need a doctor to call you must let the receptionist know before 10am,and if you want an appointment you either phone or go to the{Health Centre. { } There is also a dentist, emergency nurse a chiropodist a speech therapist and a{baby clinic.}At the{baby clinic you can buy {baby food }and many different vitamins.At the{baby clinic babies are weighed on a large weighing machine.There is a nurse in attendance
The receptionist files a personal record for each patient.
